TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit RemoteArgument extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Represents an instance of a type that can be passed across process and application domain boundaries.

span.span: Represents an instance of a type that can be passed across process and application domain boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用傳遞引數不等到執行階段決定跨處理序之型別的結構和應用程式定義域界限。Use the structure to pass arguments of types that are not determined until run time across process and application domain boundaries. 目的是類似的`VARIANT`在 COM 中的型別The purpose of is similar to that of the `VARIANT` type in COM. 您可以使用傳遞下列類型和值做為遠端的引數：You can use to pass the following types and values as remote arguments: - .. - .. - 內建資料類型。Intrinsic data types. - 陣列，其中包含內建資料類型的項目。Arrays that contain elements of intrinsic data types. 內建資料類型是基本資料類型 (也就是屬性型`true`) 或， ， ，或。An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the property of the type is `true`) or a , , , or . 提供的每個支援類型建構函式。 provides constructors for each of the types that it supports. 您也可以使用方法來建立物件。You can also use the methods to create objects. 方法會自動呼叫適當建構函式的引數類型。The methods automatically call the appropriate constructor for your argument type. 如果您建立預設無參數建構函式，屬性設定為值和屬性設定為值。If you create a using the default parameterless constructor, the property is set to the value and the property is set to the value .
